LanguageData.Malnutrition.label: malnutrition
LanguageData.Malnutrition.description: Abnormally low body fat and weight, typically caused by lack of food. Malnutrition is always very unpleaseant, but its initial effects are mild. Without food, though, a malnourished creature will waste away, losing muscle mass and capacities. Malnutrition ends with death.\n\nUpon re-feeding malnutrition naturally recovers over time. Malnourished creatures have larger appetites than normal.
LanguageData.Malnutrition.stages.trivial.label: trivial
LanguageData.Malnutrition.stages.minor.label: minor
LanguageData.Malnutrition.stages.moderate.label: moderate
LanguageData.Malnutrition.stages.severe.label: severe
LanguageData.Malnutrition.stages.extreme.label: extreme
